item.title: Init
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: It’s still January, not too late to add having a new blog to my resolutions. My last decently successful blog aentan.com lasted just under three years. I made it to the Hacker News front page a couple of times, reposted an article to Lifehacker and landed various job opportunities. Problem wasâ€¦ maintaining a WordPress site in a shared hosting environment is annoying. Dreamhost was a hundred bucks a year. Didn’t make sense anymore.
